features: A COMPLETE HYDRATION REGIMEN: This skincare kit has all of your favorite Holy Hydration necessities- a Holy Hydration! Daily Cleanser, Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, Hydrating Booster Drops, Holy Hydration! Face Cream & Eye Cream.
CLEANS & NOURISHES SKIN: This step-by-step skincare regimen will have your face feeling soft, supple and hydrated no matter where you are – think of it as your face’s happily ever after!

INFUSED WITH HYALURONIC ACID: e.l.f. SKIN's Hoy Hydration! products are infused with Hyaluronic acid to help hydrate and plump the skin, Ceramides to help build up the skin's moisture barrier, and Peptides for refreshing complexion.
TRAVEL-FRIENDLY SIZES: All of the products in the Hydrated Ever After Skincare Mini Kit are travel-friendly sizes so you can take it wherever you go!

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified.
body.description: This skincare kit has all of your favorite Holy Hydration necessities in convenient travel sizes. The Hydrated Ever After Skincare Minis include a Holy Hydration! Daily Cleanser, Holy Hydration! Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, Hydrating Booster Drops, Holy Hydration! Face Cream and Eye Cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything you need in one
reviews.reviewText: I love this kit. I get them every other month by subscription, and it's perfect. Even when I don't use makeup for the day, I'm at least using the skin brightner, eye cream, and moisturizer. The make up melting cream works brilliantly on eye makeup which is important to me, and then I use the face cleaner every night, and my skin is so radiant and soft. I love that no one guesses I'm over 45

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I was a little worried about how small the products are, but they have lasted me so far! I like how they are easy to travel with, I use this kit when I bring my skincare to my bf’s place! My skin has started to get clearer since using it, which I’m super happy about!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great products but very tiny
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used the products four times now and so far, no breakouts. It does have fragrance to it which I was expecting to break me out, but surprisingly nothing yet. The fragrance is very nice and light though, a clean smell. Just beware that this is a very small TRIAL size. I read that when I bought it and was fully prepared, but I laughed when I opened the package because it’s soooo so tiny and cute! There is plenty of product though, it will last and go a long way. You only need a tiny dab of everything, it spreads well. Leaves my skin so hydrated and soft, with a dewy glow to it. I just have a little trouble opening and screwing the lids back on because of how small they are. This kit is great for starters to skincare or if you want to just try out something new. Love it so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: The hydro boost serum is amazing. Will be ordering it in larger quantity! I have dry skin and these products are perfect for me and make my skincare so much easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love E.L.F.
reviews.reviewText: I lovethis kit. My skin has never looked so hydrated and smooth. This is definitely clean girl aesthetic. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars teeny tiny minis
reviews.reviewText: for the price I expected the sizes to be somewhat larger, I won't be repurchasing this set

reviews.reviewerName: i love love love this stuff it is 100% worth it!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smell isn’t the best but it works and it makes my skin feel amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Llego en excelente condicion a colombia la textura de las cremas son suaves y de facil absorción para la piel y trae un gotero pequeño con ácido hialuronico concentrado perfecto para hidratar pieles que están secas o mantenerlas humectadas

reviews.reviewTitle: Supper great Travel size Hydration for skin
reviews.reviewText: I needed this pack for travel. All products are super hydrating and not highly scented. Perfect :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Bought this kit for a friends birthday to get her started on a good skin care routine. And so far she’s loving it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 13 year old daughter for Christmas, her face when she opened her present and saw made my heart swell

reviews.reviewTitle: Format échantillon plutôt que des formats minis
reviews.reviewText: J'utilise les produits depuis quelques jours et rien a dire de mauvais. J'apprécie particulierement le baume démaquillant il fonctionne vraiment bien.Je donne 4 étoiles seulement car pour le format j'aurais aimé payer un peu moins cher mais autrement satisfaite jusqu'à présent.
